import React, { useState } from "react"; import Axios from 'axios'; const Form = ()=>{ // useState to get pure raw data from client page .. const [vaccine_name, setVaccineName] = useState(''); const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date().toDateString()); const [dueDate, setDueDate] = useState(''); const addVaccineDetails = ()=>{ Axios.post('http://localhost:3001/add', { vaccine_name:vaccine_name, date:date, dueDate:dueDate }) } return(
  • {setVaccineName(e.target.value)}} required/>
  • {setDate(e.target.value)}} required/>
  • {setDueDate(e.target.value)}} required/>
Vaccine name Date Due Date
Vaccine 1 12/2/2002 12/3/2003
Vaccine 1 12/2/2002 12/3/2003
Vaccine 1 12/2/2002 12/3/2003
Vaccine 1 12/2/2002 12/3/2003
Vaccine 1 12/2/2002 12/3/2003
Vaccine 1 12/2/2002 12/3/2003
Vaccine 1 12/2/2002 12/3/2003
Vaccine 1 12/2/2002 12/3/2003
) } export default Form;
